name: Leonardo DiCaprio
biography: Leonardo Wilhelm DiCaprio is an American actor and producer known for his work in biopics and period films. He has received numerous accolades, including an Academy Award.

awards.awardName: Golden Globe Award for Best Actor

name: Meryl Streep
biography: Meryl Streep is an American actress widely regarded as one of the greatest actresses of her generation. She is known for her versatility and accent adaptation.

awards.awardName: Golden Globe Award for Best Actress

name: Steven Spielberg
biography: Steven Spielberg is an American filmmaker and one of the founding pioneers of the New Hollywood era. He is known for blockbuster films such as 'Jaws', 'E.T.', and 'Jurassic Park'.

awards.awardName: Golden Globe Cecil B. DeMille Award

name: Cate Blanchett
biography: Cate Blanchett is an Australian actress and theatre director. She is known for her diverse roles in both independent and blockbuster films, earning multiple awards.

awards.awardName: Golden Globe Award for Best Actress

name: Christopher Nolan
biography: Christopher Nolan is a British-American film director, screenwriter, and producer known for his complex storytelling and innovative filmmaking techniques in movies like 'Inception' and 'The Dark Knight'.

name: Viola Davis
biography: Viola Davis is an American actress and producer. She is the first Black actress to achieve the 'Triple Crown of Acting'—winning an Academy Award, an Emmy Award, and a Tony Award.

awards.awardName: Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress
Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actress

name: Martin Scorsese
biography: Martin Scorsese is an American filmmaker known for his gritty, meticulous, and artistically ambitious films such as 'Goodfellas', 'Taxi Driver', and 'The Irishman'.

name: Natalie Portman
biography: Natalie Portman is an Israeli-American actress, director, and producer known for her roles in 'Black Swan', 'V for Vendetta', and the 'Star Wars' prequel trilogy.

name: Quentin Tarantino
biography: Quentin Tarantino is an American filmmaker and screenwriter known for his distinct storytelling style, nonlinear narratives, and extensive use of violence and dialogue in films like 'Pulp Fiction' and 'Django Unchained'.

awards.awardName: Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay
Golden Globe Award for Best Screenplay

name: Jennifer Lawrence
biography: Jennifer Lawrence is an American actress known for her roles in 'Silver Linings Playbook', 'The Hunger Games' series, and 'American Hustle'. She has received critical acclaim for her performances and won an Academy Award.

name: James Cameron
biography: James Cameron is a Canadian filmmaker known for his innovative use of special effects and deep-sea exploration. He directed blockbuster films like 'Titanic', 'Avatar', and 'The Terminator'.

name: Tom Hanks
biography: Tom Hanks is an American actor and filmmaker known for his roles in 'Forrest Gump', 'Saving Private Ryan', and 'Cast Away'. He is celebrated for his versatility and everyman persona.

awards.awardName: Golden Globe Award for Best Actor

name: Kathryn Bigelow
biography: Kathryn Bigelow is an American filmmaker known for her intense action films and pioneering work as a female director in a male-dominated industry. Notable works include 'The Hurt Locker' and 'Zero Dark Thirty'.

name: Denzel Washington
biography: Denzel Washington is an American actor, director, and producer known for his powerful performances in films like 'Training Day', 'Malcolm X', and 'Glory'.

name: Greta Gerwig

name: Morgan Freeman
biography: Morgan Freeman is an American actor and narrator known for his deep voice and authoritative presence in films like 'The Shawshank Redemption', 'Million Dollar Baby', and 'Bruce Almighty'.

name: Sofia Coppola

name: Samuel L. Jackson

name: Ava DuVernay
biography: Ava DuVernay is an American filmmaker and distributor known for her work on films like 'Selma', '13th', and 'A Wrinkle in Time'. She is a prominent voice in advocating for diversity in Hollywood.

name: Robert Downey Jr.

biography: Emma Stone is an American actress known for her roles in 'La La Land', 'The Help', and 'Easy A'. She has received critical acclaim for her performances and won an Academy Award.
